text: Little Caesars Arena is an arena in Detroit, Michigan. Construction began on April 24, 2015. It opened on September 5, 2017. It replaced the Joe Louis Arena and The Palace of Auburn Hills as the home of the Detroit Red Wings of the National Hockey League (NHL) and the Detroit Pistons of the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==References== Category:Detroit Red Wings Category:Buildings and structures in Detroit Category:Sports buildings in the United States
title: Little Caesars Arena
